column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnatis was my first exposure to deep dish and boy did I take a... Deep dive. The menu is pretty simple
column5: deep dish. Each pie takes about 30 minutes to bake
column6: and seem to go longer on busy days. And it was busy the entire time we were there. I got the vibe that the waitress wanted us in and out when she constantly offered to take our plates. Oh well
column7: I guess Chicago just moves faster.
